name: Feed The Bud!
description:
You followed a living Bud into a spooky forest full of monsters. Protect the Bud, use the slingshot in your hand and the inspired skills you get to survive before being knocked down, and collect enough seeds for the Bud!

Controls
  • Use AD or Arrow keys to move.
  • Press Space to jump.
  • Press LMB and RMB to shoot KnockBack and SlowDown Seeds.
  • Press Q to use the inspired abilities of summoning Vine Traps or casting Frost Field.
  • Press F next to Bud to carry or put down Bud.
  • Stay next to seeds to collect.
  • Stay next to Bud to feed.
By Alex Xu
